description: In the final installment of this collection, Nicoli Cole’s father’s debt has been cleared by his whoring son, however he underestimated how greed would take him over. The stories of young Nicoli’s abilities have made the rounds through the John community. One last patron arrives at the whore house to have a piece and Nicoli’s father once again offers up his son as a treat. Jaxton Wheeler supplies the case which gets him a taste. One last time Nicoli walks his John up the stairs and gives Jaxton’s cock exactly what it needed.
title: Turn My Son Into A Whore Part 3
